title: How to Make a Baking Soda Garden Spray

steps.headline: Mix the liquid soap and baking soda into the water in a large bowl.
Transfer the mixture to a spray bottle.
steps.description: Label so you know what the contents are.

steps.headline: Spray on your vegetables after the rain.
steps.description: Spray at least once a week for good organic control of the insects that are feasting on the vegetables. You will soon see the insects disappearing.

text: Mix the liquid soap and baking soda into the water in a large bowl.  Transfer the mixture to a spray bottle. Label so you know what the contents are. Spray on your vegetables after the rain. Spray at least once a week for good organic control of the insects that are feasting on the vegetables. You will soon see the insects disappearing.
